CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( Material_Type__c) == 'Trash' ,'T', IF( TEXT( Material_Type__c) == 'Cardboard' ,'c', IF( TEXT( Material_Type__c) == 'Tires' ,'TIR', IF( TEXT( Material_Type__c) == 'Metal' ,'ME', IF( TEXT( Material_Type__c) == 'Pallets' ,'PLT', '') ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Material Type Code
